description: Try our easy to follow The Ultimate Mushroom Burger recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: The Ultimate Mushroom Burger Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Spread sauce on base of the bun and layer with bacon, cheese, tomato, burger pattie, mushroom, cucumber and lettuce.
